DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect exercise PAP prescription 3 month completion study `` Should elderly patient atrial fibrillation offer physiotherapist group exercise physical activity prescription ( PAP ) use alternative ? '' regard level physical fitness , physical activity , heart rate health relate quality life ( HR-QoL ) . Also investigated variable predict possible change physical fitness .
DOC.brief_title: Physiotherapist Led Group-exercise Compared Physical Activity Prescription , 3 Months Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: Patients complete study offer follow-up 3 month regard physical fitness , physical activity , heart rate HR-QoL . Physical fitness measure symptom limited bicycle test muscle endurance test . Physical activity measure accelerometer International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) physical activity diary , HR-QoL measure short form ( SF-36 ) .
DOC.criteria: Completed study `` Should elderly patient atrial fibrillation offer physiotherapist group exercise physical activity prescription ( PAP ) use alternative ? '' Not complete study deny participation follow
